name: Mesa Verde
description:
***MUST READ CONTROLS***

Move: arrow keys

Jump: space bar

Dig downwards: Z

Dig forwards: move direction + Z

Grab items: C

Throw items: Ctrl+C

Go up level: Z in green portal

Go down level: dig downards

**********************************

A short demo for a little sandbox game made by my brother and I using Godot. Not much in the way of gameplay but core mechanics are there.

Dig sand to find items. Throw these items at the genie (located on the first floor up right from where you spawn) for score. Avoid the enemies.

All assets, programming, and music made by us.
